channel.title: ReasonReact Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest ReasonReact news and events.

item.title: Reducers Are Here!
item.description:
_v0.2.4 was done in collaboration with the ReactJS team_.
This is a release we've been planning for quite a while now, and is one that embodies what the Reason team is trying to achieve through ReasonReact.
First, a bit of context: if you use ReactJS, then you've likely heard of the the massively popular [Redux](https://github.com/reactjs/redux/) state management library. Redux's original inspiration comes from [Elm](http://elm-lang.org), whose root we share.

item.title: 0.2.1 Released
item.description: Small new breaking release! We've provided [a migration script](https://github.com/reasonml/reason-react/blob/master/HISTORY.md#021). No big change except a better (and much demanded) `self` API. Enjoy!

item.title: 0.1.5 Released
item.description: Thanks for the wait! Head over to [HISTORY.md](https://github.com/reasonml/reason-react/blob/master/HISTORY.md#015) to see the changes. This is a small non-breaking release, though we did fix a ref-related issue that can cause type errors. The fix is

item.title: Major New Release!
item.description: 0.1.4 is released! We've got a new documentation website here, a brand new ReasonReact API, a smooth migration guide, and best of all: **no breaking change**! Head over to [HISTORY.md](https://github.com/reasonml/reason-react/blob/master/HISTORY.md#014) for the incremental migration.
